name: Cat Leap
description:
A game about a cat who was left at home alone. Jump over furniture, destroy everything in your path and eat fish! Nobody can stop you now.

Was made for ScoreSpace Jam#19 in three days.

-------------------------------------------------

You need to enter your name only one time.

The game is mouse-control only.

-------------------------------------------------

CREDITS

KoKeR - programming.

Stardew Master - graphics.

Sarmen95 - music and most of the sound effects.
